Target Properties Dialog Box

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System

In the Project Explorer window, right-click a target and select Properties from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use the Category list at the left side of the dialog box to access the following pages:

  • General—Sets the IP address for the target.
  • OS and CPU Configuration—(Real-Time Module) Applies only to the generic RT target. If you plan to build an executable file based on a shipping example without connecting to an RT target, use this page to specify the OS and CPU of the RT target that will run the executable file.
  • Conditional Disable Symbols—Defines symbols to use with the Conditional Disable structure in any VI under the target.
  • VI Server—Configures the VI Server for the target.
  • Web Server—Configures the Web Server for the target.
  • User Access—Controls access to VIs and properties for the target.
  • Host Environment—Enables and controls the polling of the connection with a target to check for status.
  • Miscellaneous—Sets miscellaneous options for the target.
  • Scan Engine—(Real-Time Module) Configures settings for the NI Scan Engine running on the RT target.
